des:
If you own Amonics smart devices, this skill is designed to give you voice control over them using Alexa. Follow the steps below to get started:

Step-by-Step Instructions:
 1. Download the Amonics Smart Hub App:
 • Google Play Store: Search for “Amonics Smart Hub” and download the app on your Android device.
 • Apple App Store: Search for “Amonics Smart Hub” and download the app on your iPhone or iPad.
 2. Login to Your Account:
 • Open the Amonics Smart Hub app.
 • Enter your credentials (username and password) to log in.
 3. Check Device Connection Status with Alexa:
 • Once logged in, navigate to your list of connected devices.
 • Click on any added device to view its details.
 • You will see the device’s current connection status with the Alexa app. If the device is connected, you’re ready to control it with voice commands.

Voice Commands:
Once your devices are connected with Alexa, you can control them with the following commands:
 • Turn On a Switch:
 • Command: “Alexa, turn on the switch.”
 • Set Fan Speed:
 • Command: “Alexa, set fan speed to 50%.”

Need Help?
If you need assistance with this skill or have any questions, you can find help directly within the Amonics Smart Hub app. Navigate to the help section for detailed guidance and support.

Enjoy seamless voice control over your Amonics smart devices and make your smart home experience even more convenient!
